title: Pole/Aerial Arts
short_description: There will be 2 aerial hoop dance performers and 4 pole dance performers. They would each have a 2-4 minute routine to perform in their chosen area. Some routines would be artistic and tell a mini story, and others would show off their strength and flexibility.

schedule_organisation.name: Warwick Pole and Aerial Arts
schedule_organisation.description: Cheaper than the gym and an amazing way to get fit - Warwick Pole and Aerial Arts is the perfect society to build strength, get more flexible, build confidence and make lifelong friends. We're a supportive and inclusive society that anyone is welcome to join regardless of gender, level of fitness or previous experience.

schedule_venue.name: Piazza Stage
schedule_venue.description: Our big stage on Benefactors place next to the Piazza.
